text: Barkat Gourad Hamadou (Arabic: بركات غوراد حمادو) (1 January 1930"Long-serving Prime Minister resigns", IRIN, 6 February 2001. – 18 March 2018) was a Djiboutian politician. He served as the Prime Minister of Djibouti from 2 October 1978 until 7 March 2001. He was born in Dikhil Region, French Somaliland. He resigned in 2001 due to health problems."Le chef de l’Etat préside les travaux de la Session ordinaire du Comité central du Rassemblement Populaire pour le Progrès (RPP)", ADI, 3 July 2003 . Hamadou died on 18 March 2018 in Paris of complications from heart disease, aged 88. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Djibouti
title: Barkat Gourad Hamadou
